query2: SELECT '' as unit_id, '' as go, '' as info, '' as cmd, '' as t1, '' as t2, '' as t3, '' as c, '' as h

infoFields.name: unit_id
data: SELECT u.id as unit_id, COALESCE(vn.name, '  -- undefined --') as vehicle_name FROM units as u LEFT JOIN units_names as vn ON vn.id = u.name_id LEFT JOIN vehicles as ve ON ve.id = u.vehicle_id ORDER BY vehicle_name
